summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1347, for the improvement of alleys in Blocks One Hundred Twenty-four (124) and One Hundred Twenty-five (125), A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition to the City of Seattle, by grading and paving the same, under Ordinance No. 14995 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
